title: Push Up
description: Traditional pushups are beneficial for building upper body strength. They work the triceps, pectoral muscles, and shoulders

title: Cycling
description: Cycling is a low impact aerobic exercise that offers a wealth of benefits. It also varies in intensity, so it’s suitable for all levels

title: Jump Rope
description: This old-school workout tool delivers a cheap, portable form of cardio and total-body strengthening.

title: Jumping
description: Jumping is the most easy excercise to do anywhere, it benefits out health a lot. It can help reduce fat which will improve fitness

title: Yoga
description: Yoga offers physical and mental health benefits for people of all ages. And, if you’re going through an illness

title: Pull Up
description: The pullup is one of the most effective exercises for strengthening the back muscles. Pullups work the following muscles of the back

title: Running
description: Running can give you a longer life, better sleep, improved immunity, mood and more—it’s even good for your knees and lower back

title: Stretching
description: There are many benefits to regular stretching. Not only can stretching help increase your flexibility, which is an important factor of fitness

title: Weight Lifting
description: Strength training can help you manage or lose weight, and it can increase your metabolism to help you burn more calories
